title: Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit           Interior of the Hubbell family home. NPS photo by E.Chamberlin.  When you arrive in beautiful downtown Ganado Arizona, you find yourself wondering what can you do?  Where should I go to find more information about this wonderful place?   You can drive over to Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site located along the Pueblo Colorado Wash.   Among the large cottonwood trees, elm trees, and white poplar trees, the historic buildings are still standing after 100 years.  National Park Service in partnership with Western National Parks Association operate the historic Hubbell Trading Post.   Â    Visitor Center Operation Hours  Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site OBSERVES DAYLIGHT SAVINGS TIME. So if it is 9:00 AM at Hubbell's, than it is 8:00 AM in Arizona.  PARK OPERATION HOURS: Hubbell Trading Post is now operating on a 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM schedule. Due to staff shortage, when the park ranger is conducting a house tour, the visitor center will be closed for an hour. Please, during this time, walk the grounds and visit the trading post.
